akn:content.akn:p: The District retains the right to direct the Authority to purchase its own bonds and notes, subject to the terms and conditions of ยง 34-2202.10(h), for the purpose of dissolving or altering the Authority after such bonds and notes are cancelled or defeased.

The District further retains the right to direct the Authority to defease bonds, and the authority shall do so, conditioned upon the District providing moneys, which together with the moneys of the Authority available for defeasance, would be sufficient to satisfy the requirements of ยง 34-2202.13a(a)(1).
